author: SanghyunKo
body: Backport of #46046. As same as the main PR, this should be tested & merged together with cms-data/EgammaAnalysis-ElectronTools#12. After that, [the tag](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/blob/IB/CMSSW_10_6_X/gcc700/data/cmsswdata.txt#L25) pointing to the data repo should be updated as well.
title: Replace buggy UL2016 EGM energy correction files (backport of #46046 to 10_6_X)
